Key Match Events: Chicago overcame a 19-point deficit in the third quarter to win the game
Zach LaVine scored 14 points in the fourth quarter to help secure the victory
The Bulls ended the game on an 11-0 run
Post-Match Reflections: Zach LaVine reached the 30-point plateau for the fourth time in five games
Miscellaneous Highlights: Chris Paul missed a desperation 3-pointer in the final second for San Antonio
Victor Wembanyama had 23 points and 14 rebounds to go along with eight blocks
Others: The Bulls didn't register their first points until a White layup at the 8:18 mark of the first quarter
San Antonio went scoreless over the game's final 3:52
